import React from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; // Import useNavigate hook import { UserAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import Sidebar from './Sidebar'; import Header from './Header'; function Account() { const { user, logout } = UserAuth(); const navigate = useNavigate(); // Get navigate function for redirection const handleLogout = async () => { try { await logout(); console.log('You are logged out'); navigate('/'); // Redirect to the sign-in page after logging out } catch (e) { console.log(e.message); } }; return (
